meanings.definition: Relating to a convocation or assembly.
meanings.sent1: The convocational ceremony brought together students from all grades.
meanings.sent2: The convocational event was well-organized and attended by many.
meanings.sent3: The convocational dress code made everyone look like they were part of a special club.
meanings.sent4: The convocational atmosphere in the room was charged with excitement and anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The convocational banner hung proudly at the entrance, welcoming all guests.

meanings.definition: Of or pertaining to a formal gathering or meeting.
meanings.sent1: The convocational dinner was a grand affair with elegant decorations.
meanings.sent2: The convocational conference room was equipped with state-of-the-art technology.
meanings.sent3: The convocational seating arrangement resembled a royal banquet.
meanings.sent4: The convocational atmosphere in the room was filled with dignitaries and important guests.
meanings.sent5: The convocational invitation specified a black-tie dress code for all attendees.

meanings.definition: Involving the calling together of a group of people.
meanings.sent1: The convocational announcement gathered everyone in the town square.
meanings.sent2: The convocational meeting was scheduled to discuss important community issues.
meanings.sent3: The convocational invitation was so enticing that everyone showed up promptly.
meanings.sent4: The convocational phone call brought together all the team members for a brainstorming session.
meanings.sent5: The convocational email urged everyone to attend the emergency meeting without delay.
